QuestData.Title: A New Master... But Who?
QuestData.Description: You've arrived just in time.$b$bHere's the skinny: the Dark Iron dwarves in the gorge have been acting strangely, and the Thorium Brotherhood intends to find out why. Overseer Oilfist doesn't like surprises.$b$bWe suspect that they're following orders from some new leader. I have reason to believe that Gravius Grimesilt, just south of here, knows who it is.$b$bEven here in Searing Gorge, we've begun to hear tales of your exploits, $n. You should have no problem with Grimesilt.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This dwarf should know what's happening with the Dark Irons.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Dark Iron Memo from Gravius Grimesilt at Grimesilt Worksite.
QuestData.RewardText: Let's see... Overseer Maltorius... we're quite familiar with him and his work.$b$bWhat's this? The "archduke"? That sounds promising.
